short_summary: This solicitation is for the requirement of a subscription to the INSPEC Database.
description: The solicitation is for the requirement of a subscription to the INSPEC Database. Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by the response deadline time of 14:00 EST/EDT, on 2024-02-19.
full_summary:
===============

**INSPEC Database Subscription Request for Proposal**

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4223553740-Doc4340058073

**Deadline for Completion:** February 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EST/EDT

**Request Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified vendors to submit a proposal for a subscription to the INSPEC Database.

**Scope of Work:**
The INSPEC Database Subscription Request for Proposal seeks a vendor to provide a comprehensive database subscription package for the INSPEC Database. The successful vendor will be responsible for ensuring timely and responsive support for database access and retrieval services.

**Pre-Qualification**
To be considered, vendors must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the (CFTA) Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Submission Requirements**
All tendered responses must be received by 2:00 PM EST/EDT on February 19, 2024. The submission must include all required supporting documentation, as outlined in the solicitation package.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Vendors will be assessed based on the pricing criteria of lowest price. Bidders must have a thorough understanding of the INSPEC Database functionality, strategic anticipation, and technical implementation.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

 Gabrielle Durand-Marsh
(SPPC/PWGSC)
E-mail: [gabe.l. Durand-marsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabe.l.Durand-marsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

.

### Supporting Requirements:

*   The requirement is valid in jurisdictions that adhere to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   There are no specific requirements for particular provinces or regions.

###   Disclaimer:

The submission of an Intent to Bid or a Proposal from a candidate does not install any contractual obligation on the department. Competitors must carefully review the solicitation criteria and suggested supporting documentation before submitting a proposal.
